verbose_text: Immunoblotting with anti-HOIL-1L serum capable of detecting the N-terminal region, which includes the UBL, revealed that the ~ 30 kDa HOIL-N fragment was not expressed in HOIL-1L null / null MEFs, whereas a small amount of HOIL-N was detected in both WT and HOIL-1L -/- MEFs.
evidence: ~30 kDa HOIL-N fragment was not expressed
